CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that editing sourcecode which is referred by multiple stylesheets (via sourceURL comment) updates all stylesheets.

Headers count: 3

Running: Make edits with Sources Panel
Both headers and uiSourceCode content:
div{color:EDITED;}
      

Running: Make edits via css model
Both headers and uiSourceCode content:
* { --foo: "bar" }
